data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 819,434 lost in Tokushima that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tokushima, Japan

data.prayer: the state of Tokushima has (about) 4,666 people who know Jesus, 13,158 people who know about him culturally, and 806,276 people who are far from Jesus.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 176 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Tokushima, Japan.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 806,276, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Persian people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Tokushima, Japan.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Tokushima.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Tokushima to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

location.name: Tokushima
location.people_groups_list: Japanese, Punjabi, Eurasian, South Asian, Bengali-speaking, Okinawan, Ryukyuan
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Japanese (120,880,000), Punjabi (70,000), Eurasian (126,000), South Asian, Bengali-speaking (69,000), Okinawan, Ryukyuan (1,183,000)
